topics.body:
I love you, Doug Walker and I get it, but please,
!https://31.media.tumblr.com/325a05a1923f9ba15341425934e3d6d3/tumblr_n3zgu2Cpg41swm49co2_400.png!
I'm starting to have a hard time giving a genuine shit about feminism, racial equality or gay pride. If I ever get a job on writing for TV or video games (which is wishful thinking at best), I will have a "Likable character first, politically correct character 23rd and Politically correct design 76th" philosophy
topics.author: 50d9a3aea4c72dc9b3000120

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534f9d3a6368725050de0400#post_534f9d3a6368725050de0400
Finally someone who understands. I have seen so many shows have a gay character just for the sake of having a gay character that it pisses me off. The make being gay the entire identity of character and then they say "See we have a gay character. We're being progressive. Love us!" When you center the entire character around being gay it loses any kind of meaning or point. _Thanks Glee_
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

Are people still bitching about the heels? For fuck sake it's a fight game and they serve a purpose!

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534f9d3a6368725050de0400#post_534f9d3a6368725050de0400
Yes! You are becoming me!

Not really but O've often felt the same way. Mostly out of apathy towards the awful "badass action girls" out there who have basically no personality. Who are only there because having a woman in the narrative was apparently essential but the writers were not interested enough to give her a role outside of the action, or an interesting way to be involved in the action.
You have done a better job articulating it and I thank you.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534f9d3a6368725050de0400#post_534f9d3a6368725050de0400
[bq="NotYourAverageLurker"]I love you, Doug Walker and I get it, but please,
!https://31.media.tumblr.com/325a05a1923f9ba15341425934e3d6d3/tumblr_n3zgu2Cpg41swm49co2_400.png!
I'm starting to have a hard time giving a genuine shit about feminism, racial equality or gay pride. If I ever get a job on writing for TV or video games (which is wishful thinking at best), I will have a "Likable character first, politically correct character 23rd and Politically correct design 76th" philosophy[/bq]
People seem to forget that Zero Suit Samus is more than capable of beating the shit out of the other fighters, whether she had heels or not.
And that the heels are jet boots.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534f9d3a6368725050de0400#post_534f9d3a6368725050de0400
I like Doug but he doesn't seem to understand what he's talking about. Samus has aways been a bad ass, both in the power suit and in just her Zero suit, if you don't believe me, go play Zero Mission on the game boy advance, and if its all about the heels then really we need to bring up Bayonetta's and Raiden's heels, no-one complained for them having heels and they serve just as much purpose for them as the jet boots do for Samus.

"But what about Othe-" LAA LA LA-LA LA LA, LA LA LA LA LAAAAAAAA, I CAN'T HEAR YOU! NO NEW METROID SINCE PRIME 3, LAA LA LA!
topics.author: 4fde01d7945b70057c00024d

topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534fda9263687235d45d0300#post_534fda9263687235d45d0300
The thing about Bayonetta and Raiden's heels is that, just like Samus, it's not really worth noting that they have heels.

Nobody is going to notice Bayonetta's heels since she's got freaking guns attached to them and nobody is going to notice Raiden's while he's cutting shit up.

topics.body: The only thing thay I dont like about the heel is the yellow neon color. Why they not chose a color that blends bettet with her outfit?

Anybody else find it sad that metroid other m may be the last metroid game that will be made?


Also why did Raiden's high heels not cause a shitstorm?  Sure when a guy wear high heels no one cares, but when a women wears high heels look out people.  Talk about a double standard :V
